page.title: 02RECREATION IN BOX PARISH.
page.content: { RECREATION IN BOX PARISH. . { { }The village of{Box}is fortunate in having an enthusiastic group in the {Archaeological and Natural History {Society}who pursue the walking of as many foothpaths as possible. Not only does this group walk the footpaths but it also keeps the council informed of those that have been blocked by fencing. In tne{Beech woods of{Quarry Hill}the footpaths have been churned up by motorbikes. It is therefore important that the network of public rights of way be maintained and preserved for future generations. Many paths have been waymarked along their routes although some land owners do not like this practice and promptly remove them.
